Text: NYISO Tariff Filing Cost Allocation for New Interconnection FacilitiesTIE List On Wednesday August the NYISO made a Management Committee approved Filing of New Attachment S to Open Access Transmission Tariff to Implement Rules to Allocate Responsibility for the Cost of New Interconnection Facilities and Request for Expedited Action This filing is being distributed to all subscribers to the TIE as indicated to FERC The following files make up the filing submitted August th See attached file Boergers ltr transmitting Attachment SvpdfSee attached file Attachment Clean Attachment SvpdfSee attached file Attachment Clean OATT Bodyvpdf See attached file Attachment Blackline Attachment SvpdfSee attached file Attachment Blackline OATT bodyvpdf Boergers ltr transmitting Attachment Svpdf Attachment Clean Attachment Svpdf Attachment Clean OATT Bodyvpdf Attachment Blackline Attachment Svpdf Attachment Blackline OATT bodyvpdf
